DOC.brief_summary: Play Nicely , 40 minute , interactive , media-rich , CD ROM teach parent , health care professional , counselor , child care workers/teachers basic aggression management child age 1-7 . For information program review result previous study , see www.playnicely.org . The objective study determine use brief intervention well child visit affect parent ' plan discipline child .
DOC.brief_title: Brief Primary Care Intervention Helps Parents With Discipline
